newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown/dollar at 26.432 (26.052).
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown/dollar at 26.432 (26.052).

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 26.432 to the dollar after Tuesday's fixing at 26.052, and at 17.811 to the mark from 17.628.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +3.15 percent, down from a deviation of +4.05 on Tuesday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown traded at +3.13 percent.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT) and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of a mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
